CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 28, 1945, pg. 14, reads: "A Big Smile For Daddy! - Little Sandra Celesta Robinson, daughter of Pvt. and Mrs. Sylvester Robinson, of Wylie Avenue, gives a great big smile in honor of her daddy, who is serving with the armed forces overseas. Sandra's playmates came in to help her celebrate her second birthday. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children gathered around table with cake for second birthday party of Sandra Celestra Robinson being held by Mrs. Robinson in her home decorated with leaf patterned wallpaper, Wylie Avenue, Hill District
